attributes.title: Nun ya
attributes.review:
I kept checking every single day if he would update any information on this app and honestly he’s done a terrible job. I just can’t believe the audacity to create a whole app and not update is like a good president should do. It’s just despicable. It really just grinds my gears. I’m absolutely flabbergasted. Appalled. Disappointed. Let me ask you one question. Now take a minute to really clear your mind before you read this next part........

Would Obama do this?....

No that’s what I thought.

attributes.title: what is this?
attributes.review: Hi, please don’t download this app. It has THE worst app features I’ve ever experienced. Why would anyone want to torture their supporters in this manner?! If you are thinking that these other horrible, one-star reviews are fake, think again before your phone also starts crashing like crazy!! I’ve never left a review on the App Store before, but this app really ain’t it. Remove this app, don’t download this app!! You’ll be making a horrible mistake, if you don’t!! I’m starting to believe that these crashes are the effects of Trump’s lackeys trying to hack into people’s phones!! Unbelievable!! Protect your data & your identity!!

attributes.title: T R A S H .
attributes.review: i do not recommend this app because it is simply TRASH.

attributes.title: Lagggg!!!!
attributes.review: It honestly just continuously lagged and glitches my entire phone... I downloaded it because I heard all these rumors of a talking, speaking 🍊orange 🍊 and I was like “I GOTTA see this!!!” Turns out the rumors are no longer rumors, they are PROVEN facts!!!!! *amazing* But basically this app is terrible, I would definitely not recommend getting it!!!! It makes my phone glitch while using it and after!!!!!!!

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: When you open the app you first see a big scary orange monster, he may be a new Cheeto mascot I just haven’t heard of yet but any ways I now understand why the app is for 17+ I will definitely be having nightmares for the next few weeks 🥰🥰😻😻❤️❤️✨✨

attributes.title: this app is seriously bugged out
attributes.review:
I got this app purely bc i wanted to see what he wanted to do but there’s so much miss information and i keep getting spam calls needless to say don’t get it and def don’t put you’re number in, the miss information starts right when you open it kEeP aMeriCA gReaT 
oh honey we were never grate we would’ve been better off if we were never colonized

attributes.review: Worst app. Worst president. Don’t download.

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: I logged on the app to check and see what my president was up to and I was horrified to see some orange man on my screen !!!!!! Where is OBAMA !!!!
